data.text:
#ALICIA is out right now!! I’m grateful to share all the different sides of me with you. I’m grateful you love me as I am! Press play and let the magic begin 💜💜💜🥳🥳🥳 ⁣
⁣
And tell me your favorites!! I can’t wait to hear 😘😘😘 https://t.co/fP7293upZD https://t.co/OLwQmOFk5I

The first @keyssoulcare ritual is HERE. Have ya’ll checked it out yet??? 🤩🤩🤩

Get all of the details about the the amazzzzing Skin Transformation Cream, Sage + Oat Milk Candle,
and Obsidian Facial Roller now available at https://t.co/KlZ2iXGpiy and @ULTABeauty 💫💜💫 https://t.co/0GY8gUiiCO

Alicia Keys's foray into beauty was well worth the wait.
https://t.co/p87cdfPxy4

We're already in love with the singer-songwriter's namesake skin-care line. 
 https://t.co/8XQvaZ7l4i
🥰🥰🥰 https://t.co/4vPT3IYO8w

This girl is on fire 🔥 @keyssoulcare by @aliciakeys is now at Ulta Beauty! Shop the candle, facial cream and facial roller to care for your body, mind and spirit, and stay tuned for more Keys Soulcare coming in January. What are you most excited for? #ultabeauty https://t.co/N50dkZI3vH

Get all of the details about the the amazzzzing Skin Transformation Cream, Sage + Oat Milk Candle, and Obsidian Facial Roller now available at https://t.co/KlZ2iXGpiy and @ultabeauty 💥💥💥💥#KeysSoulcare https://t.co/OaqsQCQV2l

I created @keyssoulcare bc I’ve always had real challenges with my skin. I realized so much of it was based on energy around me & how anxious or stressed I felt. 
⁣
We’ve worked with LOVE to offer u clean formulas and rituals that help you create space for yourself! https://t.co/S8uvrhVVrw

Excuse me while I use this amazing Obsidan Roller on my face!! 😘😘😘 ⁣
⁣
The first @keyssoulcare ritual is HERE and I’m SOOOO crazy excited to finally share it with you!!!!!!!!!!🥰🥰🥰💥💥💥⁣ https://t.co/RnxlWUMvtC

I heard you were looking for me????💜💜💜 @reebecatavares 

Happy beautiful birthday!!! May this be the best year yet and all the others to follow even better 💫💫💫

Sending love and light forever!!

I LOVE a good candle so I had to launch @keyssoulcare starting with the perfect one 🕯💜

Each offering has a mantra that I love - as you light this candle repeat “I shine at full wattage.”😘😘😘Tmrw I’m sharing the other two offerings in the first ritual! I can’t wait!!! https://t.co/XlIDc1cD3b
😘😘😘💜💜💜 https://t.co/Rz2NzFh8Tm
Everything means nothing... If I ain't got you 🤍🤍🤍💫💫💫 https://t.co/mRlE8rMwoj

The Sage + Oat Milk Candle is dropping in two days 🔥

Sage brings energy and clarity encouraging mindfulness while the scent of oat milk soothes—it's like a love letter to your soul.

📱Text us to join the waitlist for the ritual https://t.co/hO3uLJar0G https://t.co/EAjJSiJv7l
Retweet!!! 💜💜💜👇🏽👇🏽👇🏽 https://t.co/HyNuQ1Ta5N
There’s no words to describe this love 🥰🥰🥰 https://t.co/Lkp3fSgCHO
Happy Sunday!!! 💜💜💜💜 https://t.co/cXPIryqhD1
https://t.co/8BtCCy9wLY
https://t.co/lX0Ou89LZQ
https://t.co/m5zJifTN6r
Big love to @HarlemCandles 💜https://t.co/0FWOOqlTaF
Tell me your favorite small businesses – let’s spread some good vibes! Sharing a few of mine below. I love y’all 💜🕯✨

Thinking about u⁣
Loving our connection ⁣
Grateful for change and growth and evolution ⁣
Been thinking a lot about accepting our blessings. 
Even what seems small, let’s accept them, welcome them, receive them.⁣
⁣
Are you ready to receive your blessings?⁣ 💜💜💜💜 https://t.co/nuBLz5bvKc
Can ya’ll guess this?? https://t.co/rqY4GqpGK2

There’s such a beautiful strength that comes when you realize you’re the only one who's got what you’ve got. In my @MasterClass, I want to help you find it. I’ll share my approach to uncovering your voice and using it to create a powerful piece of music 💜https://t.co/q04UvToUBR https://t.co/8nfci4wiXi
For the very first Artist on Artist, we brought together two of the biggest musicians in the world: @ShawnMendes and @aliciakeys https://t.co/VPAZpwlYWQ

Thank you all for the love on #InWonder 🖤 Join me today at 1pm ET on @netflix’s youtube for a special livestream event, including an artist on artist convo with @aliciakeys, a surprise announcement & more https://t.co/O9qYkYJ5G0 https://t.co/TTrUU2ZXba

Alicia Keys as Pianos🎹
A thread✨ https://t.co/JsxcCivr95

My Monday mood! Sending ya’ll blessings and good energy for the week ahead⁣.

Jill Scott Ft. Jill Scott 💫💫💫 from the ALICIA album!! 💥💥💥⁣
⁣
All these sides of me… this is the dreamy, hippie hood side.... y’all know her? ;-) ⁣
What side are u expressing today?? https://t.co/3VwMFaORWG
Let’s keep that frequency high!!!💥💥💥 https://t.co/qZJDMQNuFK
Big love!!! Good morning 🤩🤩🤩 Ya’ll ready for BE?!? 💜💜💜 https://t.co/LIA1m6m19R
I’ll be streaming on my new twitch channel TODAY @ 3pm ET. I’ll be answering YOUR questions. What r u thinking about? Or want advice on? See ya’ll soon!! 🤩💜🙏🏽 https://t.co/YcyGqjdoee

Reminder that I’ll be streaming on my new twitch channel TMRW 11/18 @ 3pm ET. I’ll be answering YOUR questions. What r u thinking about? Or want advice on? Tweet me and let me know cause I got you!! 🤩💜🙏🏽 https://t.co/YcyGqjdoee
👀👀👀💜💜💜 https://t.co/1KFoR1RSa6

Pillow fight anyone?? ⁣
⁣
The best medicine is laughter!! Make sure u laugh today?!! Sending u ultimate love! ⁣
⁣
And if we had a pillow fight I would win!! 🤣🤣🤣 https://t.co/rcUNU4uEr5
Georgia!! Talk to me!! Who is ready? This is BIG!!! 💜💜💜 https://t.co/e4QMpu44yr

A lot of people say I give the best friend advice! So, I’m trying something new this week! I’ll be streaming on my new twitch channel Wed 11/18 @ 3pm ET. I’ll be answering YOUR questions. 

What r u thinking about? Or want advice on? Add some thoughts below👇🏾Username: aliciakeys https://t.co/rIvEW6hAlh

Three hour drive, I'm headin' nowhere⁣
I've got the time now that you're not here⁣
I keep travelin' by, travelin' by⁣
Lookin' for love, you got me lookin' for love⁣
⁣
Good Sunday vibes ⁣
What are u looking for in love? https://t.co/PFnMvsCgyc
Happy Diwali to all those celebrating✨✨✨🪔🪔🪔
